Title: Les passagers
Writer: Haydée Caillot, Jean-Claude Guiguet (scenario), Gwenaëlle Simon (monologue from play "C'était bien")
Actors: Fabienne Babe, Philippe Garziano, Bruno Putzulu, Stéphane Rideau
Plot: A tramcar in the suburbs of Paris, a woman commenting on its passengers who are as different as a young man with flowers, a whimsical old lady, a man who doesn't want to be just a customer....<a href="//m.imdb.com/title/tt0201833/plotsummary?ref_=m_tt_ov_pl">
